zones.name: Pune Railway Station Zone
zones.description: Dense pedestrian and vehicle traffic near the main railway station

zones.name: FC Road School Zone
zones.description: Active school zone on Fergusson College Road — children crossing frequently

zones.name: Laxmi Road Market Zone
zones.description: Busy commercial market area with high pedestrian and two-wheeler density

zones.name: Shivajinagar Hospital Zone
zones.description: Hospital zone — noise and speed restrictions strictly enforced

zones.name: Hinjewadi IT Park Zone
zones.description: IT corridor with peak-hour office traffic — moderate risk during rush hours

zones.name: Viman Nagar Residential Zone
zones.description: Residential zone with children, elderly, and internal colony traffic

zones.name: Katraj Ghat Blind Curve Zone
zones.description: Sharp curves and accident-prone ghat section — requires extreme caution

zones.name: Koregaon Park Nightlife Zone
zones.description: High pedestrian activity at night — elevated DUI and speed risk

zones.name: Hadapsar Industrial Zone
zones.description: Industrial area with moderate heavy-vehicle movement

zones.name: Baner Road Construction Zone
zones.description: Active construction zone — uneven road surface and reduced lane width
